reqs:
Ph.D. thesis; Fall and Spring
This section is to be used by new students beginning their Ph.D. thesis in September and by continuing students who will not submit their thesis in the first term.
Ph.D. thesis; Fall term only
This section is to be used by students who will be submitting their thesis in the fall semester. Continuing students and new students should register in section 001.
Ph.D. thesis; Spring term only
This section is to be used ONLY by new students entering the programme in January. Continuing students should register in section 001.
